value.title: Ray Kurzweil
value.excerpt: Raymond Kurzweil is an American inventor and futurist. He is involved in fields such as optical character recognition, text-to-speech synthesis, speech recognition technology, and electronic keyboard instruments.
value.name: Ray Kurzweil
value.bio: Raymond Kurzweil is an American inventor and futurist. He is involved in fields such as optical character recognition, text-to-speech synthesis, speech recognition technology, and electronic keyboard instruments.

value.title: Sonja Betschart
value.excerpt: Passionate about using technology to make the world a better place and create new businesses and experiences
value.name: Sonja Betschart
value.bio: Passionate about using technology to make the world a better place and create new businesses and experiences

value.title: Stuart J. Russell
value.excerpt: Stuart Jonathan Russell is a computer scientist known for his contributions to artificial intelligence. He is a Professor of Computer Science at the University of California, Berkeley and Adjunct Professor of Neurological Surgery at the University of California, San Francisco.
value.name: Stuart J. Russell
value.bio: Stuart Jonathan Russell is a computer scientist known for his contributions to artificial intelligence. He is a Professor of Computer Science at the University of California, Berkeley and Adjunct Professor of Neurological Surgery at the University of California, San Francisco.

value.title: Yoshua Bengio
value.excerpt: Yoshua Bengio OC FRSC is a Canadian computer scientist, most noted for his work on artificial neural networks and deep learning. He was a co-recipient of the 2018 ACM A.M. Turing Award for his work in deep learning.
value.name: Yoshua Bengio
value.bio: Yoshua Bengio OC FRSC is a Canadian computer scientist, most noted for his work on artificial neural networks and deep learning. He was a co-recipient of the 2018 ACM A.M. Turing Award for his work in deep learning.

value.title: Alex Smola
value.excerpt: Director for machine learning at Amazon Web Services, building exciting machine learning tools for data scientists, computer vision, NLP, deep learning and beyond.
value.name: Alex Smola
value.bio: Director for machine learning at Amazon Web Services, building exciting machine learning tools for data scientists, computer vision, NLP, deep learning and beyond.

value.title: Kyle Cranmer
value.excerpt: Particle physics, LHC, stats/ML/AI, collaborative & open science. Executive Director Moore-Sloan Data Science Environment at NYU.
value.name: Kyle Cranmer
value.bio: Particle physics, LHC, stats/ML/AI, collaborative & open science. Executive Director Moore-Sloan Data Science Environment at NYU.

value.title: Verity Harding
value.excerpt: AI and politics. Head of Global Policy & Partnerships at DeepMind. Views are my own. She / her.

value.title: Carol E. Reiley
value.excerpt: Entrepreneur/Scientist/Roboticist. Saving the world, one robot at a time. Cofounder & CEO of healthcare startup. Board member & Advisor of http://drive.ai.
value.name: Carol E. Reiley
value.bio: Entrepreneur/Scientist/Roboticist. Saving the world, one robot at a time. Cofounder & CEO of healthcare startup. Board member & Advisor of http://drive.ai.

value.excerpt: Vice President, Google and head of Google Cloud AI. I love Algorithms, Systems, Machine Learning, AI.

value.bio: Vice President, Google and head of Google Cloud AI. I love Algorithms, Systems, Machine Learning, AI.

value.excerpt: We're building the world's most experienced driver.

value.title: Harry Shum
value.excerpt: Harry Shum is a Chinese computer scientist. He is one of the doctoral student of Raj Reddy. He is the Executive Vice President of Artificial Intelligence & Research at Microsoft. He is known for his research on computer vision and computer graphics, and for the development of the search engine Bing.
value.name: Harry Shum
value.bio: Harry Shum is a Chinese computer scientist. He is one of the doctoral student of Raj Reddy. He is the Executive Vice President of Artificial Intelligence & Research at Microsoft. He is known for his research on computer vision and computer graphics, and for the development of the search engine Bing.

value.title: Mariya Yao
value.excerpt: Editor-In-Chief @TOPBOTS. Former CTO @MetamavenAI. #AI #ML @Forbes writer, speaker, author @AppliedAIBook, maker of lovable #UX & crappy #bots

value.bio: Editor-In-Chief @TOPBOTS. Former CTO @MetamavenAI. #AI #ML @Forbes writer, speaker, author @AppliedAIBook, maker of lovable #UX & crappy #bots

value.title: Oren Etzioni
value.excerpt: Oren Etzioni is an American entrepreneur, professor of computer science, and CEO of the Allen Institute for Artificial Intelligence.
value.name: Oren Etzioni
value.bio: Oren Etzioni is an American entrepreneur, professor of computer science, and CEO of the Allen Institute for Artificial Intelligence.

value.excerpt: Consulting CTO at Oculus VR. Working on artificial general intelligence (AGI) in Facebook
value.name: John Carmack
value.bio: Consulting CTO at Oculus VR. Working on artificial general intelligence (AGI) in Facebook

value.title: Kai-Fu Lee
value.excerpt: Kai-Fu Lee is a Taiwanese-born American computer scientist, businessman, and writer. He is currently based in Beijing, China. Lee developed the world's first speaker-independent, continuous speech recognition system as his Ph.D. thesis at Carnegie Mellon.
value.name: Kai-Fu Lee
value.bio: Kai-Fu Lee is a Taiwanese-born American computer scientist, businessman, and writer. He is currently based in Beijing, China. Lee developed the world's first speaker-independent, continuous speech recognition system as his Ph.D. thesis at Carnegie Mellon.

value.title: Martin Ford
value.excerpt: Martin Ford is a futurist and author focusing on artificial intelligence and robotics, and the impact of these technologies on the job market, economy and society. He has written three books on technology.
value.name: Martin Ford
value.bio: Martin Ford is a futurist and author focusing on artificial intelligence and robotics, and the impact of these technologies on the job market, economy and society. He has written three books on technology.

value.title: Rajat Monga
value.excerpt: Sr. Director/Distinguished Engineer. Leading #TensorFlow at Google.
value.name: Rajat Monga
value.bio: Sr. Director/Distinguished Engineer. Leading #TensorFlow at Google.

value.title: Rana el Kaliouby
value.excerpt: Entrepreneur. Scientist. Co-founder and CEO @Affectiva. On a mission to humanize technology with #EmotionAI - YGL @WEF. #HumanFirst
value.name: Rana el Kaliouby
value.bio: Entrepreneur. Scientist. Co-founder and CEO @Affectiva. On a mission to humanize technology with #EmotionAI - YGL @WEF. #HumanFirst

value.title: Rodney Brooks
value.excerpt: Rodney Brooks is the Panasonic Professor of Robotics (emeritus) at MIT. He is a robotics entrepreneur and most recently was Founder and CTO of Robust.ai
value.name: Rodney Brooks
value.bio: Rodney Brooks is the Panasonic Professor of Robotics (emeritus) at MIT. He is a robotics entrepreneur and most recently was Founder and CTO of Robust.ai

value.title: Sebastian Thrun
value.excerpt: Sebastian Thrun is an innovator, entrepreneur educator, and computer scientist from Germany. He is CEO of the Kitty Hawk Corporation, chairman and co-founder of Udacity. Before that, he was a Google VP and Fellow, a Professor of Computer Science at Stanford University, and before that at Carnegie Mellon University.
value.name: Sebastian Thrun
value.bio: Sebastian Thrun is an innovator, entrepreneur educator, and computer scientist from Germany. He is CEO of the Kitty Hawk Corporation, chairman and co-founder of Udacity. Before that, he was a Google VP and Fellow, a Professor of Computer Science at Stanford University, and before that at Carnegie Mellon University.

value.title: Sougwen Chung
value.excerpt: Chung's work explores the mark-made-by-hand and the mark-made-by-machine as an approach to understanding the dynamics of humans and systems. Chung is a former research fellow at MIT’s Media Lab and a pioneer in the field of human-machine collaboration. In 2019, she was selected as the Woman of the Year in Monaco for achievement in the Arts & Sciences.
value.name: Sougwen Chung
value.bio: Chung's work explores the mark-made-by-hand and the mark-made-by-machine as an approach to understanding the dynamics of humans and systems. Chung is a former research fellow at MIT’s Media Lab and a pioneer in the field of human-machine collaboration. In 2019, she was selected as the Woman of the Year in Monaco for achievement in the Arts & Sciences.

value.excerpt: AI artist | futurist | storyteller | recovering youtuber. Follow my documentary @iamhuman for screenings/release dates. AI album: http://bit.ly/iamAI

value.title: Vishal Sikka
value.excerpt: Vishal Sikka is the Founder and CEO of Vianai, a startup based in the San Francisco Bay Area that provides advanced technological software and services in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning to large companies around the world.

value.bio: Vishal Sikka is the Founder and CEO of Vianai, a startup based in the San Francisco Bay Area that provides advanced technological software and services in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning to large companies around the world.

topItems.title: Joy Buolamwini
topItems.excerpt: Joy Adowaa Buolamwini is a Ghanaian-American computer scientist and digital activist based at the MIT Media Lab. She founded the Algorithmic Justice League, an organisation that looks to challenge bias in decision making software.
topItems.name: Joy Buolamwini
topItems.bio: Joy Adowaa Buolamwini is a Ghanaian-American computer scientist and digital activist based at the MIT Media Lab. She founded the Algorithmic Justice League, an organisation that looks to challenge bias in decision making software.
